name: [AA] Faithful Combatants Institution
description:
[FCI] Faithful Combatants Institution           
Members: 0

This Institution was held by the Old Super Clan under the name of Alpha Authority, the clan that has now downgraded to the name, so-called, Alpha Insurgency. 

Owner: xScriptBlox_Inc (Awaiting Approval)

Anyhow, since we'll be gathering along in the future I welcome you all to sit back and relax and improve your Combat.

Ranks: Grade+, Skilled+, Advanced+, Professional+, Ultimate.
